sentences.en: About their becoming easily soiled and unsanitary, perhaps.
sentences.cn: 可能是嫌它们容易脏, 以致不卫生.

sentences.en: Furthermore, unsanitary conditions in homes and hospitals exposed mothers and their babies to serious infections.
sentences.cn: 此外, 家居和医院不卫生的条件使得产妇和新生儿处于严重的感染危险之中.

sentences.en: He pointed to chronic overcrowding, unsanitary cells, dirty lavatories, broken showers and mattresses on the ground.
sentences.cn: 他指出了长期的过度拥挤 、 不卫生的牢房 、 肮脏的厕所 、 破败的浴室还有扔在地上的床垫等问题.

sentences.en: I would call it one of the most unsanitary areas in the world.
sentences.cn: 我愿称它为世界最不卫生的地区之一.

sentences.en: Is plumbing of adequate size and design to prevent an unsanitary condition?
sentences.cn: 管径在设计上是否充分考虑了防止不清洁因素?

sentences.en: It is unsanitary to eat without washing one's hands.
No person shall manufacture, prepare, preserve, package or store for sale any food under unsanitary conditions.
sentences.cn: 任何人不得在不卫生条件下生产, 准备, 保存, 包装,贮藏,出售任何食品.

sentences.en: The reddish colour of suburban water by no means suggests unsanitary conditions.
sentences.cn: 郊区的水呈现红色无疑说明了存在不卫生的情况.

sentences.en: What about squeamish customers who might consider the paper unsanitary?
sentences.cn: 那麽,认为纸张不卫生而感到恶心的顾客 呢 ?

trans.tran_en: dirty and likely to cause disease
